name: Late Night Desert Delivery
description:
Objective: Follow the blue light!

Don't Die! Deliver!

How to play:

Find the cyan light, drive towards it and deliver! You accelerate and reverse using either the left thumbstick on the gamepad or the W and S keys on the keyboard while you steer using the mouse (camera-based steering). You brake using the left trigger on the gamepad or the spacebar and the left mouse button for the mouse and keyboard.

Have fun!
